prompt: Create a luxury-themed splash screen with a centered diamond-shaped logo, an elegant app title in a cursive font, and a subtle fading loading indicator at the bottom. The background should feature a gradient from deep gold to black, evoking sophistication. The logo should have a metallic sheen effect, and the title should use a light gold color for a premium look. Ensure the layout is balanced with generous padding to create a refined and exclusive aesthetic suitable for a high-end app.
